英文公告.機關名稱: National Tax Administration of the Northern Taiwan Province, MOF
英文公告.附加說明: Tender Basic Qualification 1.Proof of Company registration or establishment of the supplier, such as certificate of company registration or commercial registration, certificate of establishment or business registration, factory registration certificate, industry registration certificate, practicing license.2. Proof of tax payment of the supplier, which shall be a business tax payment receipt or the latest sales revenue and tax report approved and affixed with an official seal by the responsible tax-assessing authority. If the supplier is unable to provide the most recent certifying documents in time, the tax payment receipt of the immediate preceding period may be used in replacement. Newly established suppliers who have not reached the time limit for filing their first tax payment may use, as a replacement, the approval letter of business establishment issued by the responsible business tax-assessing authority and the relevant documents in relation to their application for the purchase of uniformed invoices.3.Proof of credibility of a supplier, such as the proof, issued by a clearing house or a financial institution within the last 6 months before the deadline for tendering, that the supplier is not a debarred customer, and the proof of the recent 3 years concerning record of no bouncing check. Tender Special Qualification1.Suppliers must be well-experienced or possessing actual achievements. The scope may include contracts of completing data entry within five years before the deadline for tendering. The single contract amount was over 4 million NT dollars or the accumulated contract amount was over 30 million NT dollars, suppliers should provide the inspection and acceptance certificate by the procuring entity or other proof with contract amount and copy of contract.2. Suppliers must have substantial equipments with affidavit. The equipments include more than 30 of those of Chinese-English data entry and at least 1 media transcoding equipment. Where the suppliers do not possess those equipments themselves, they may instead submit a proof of lease, lease commitment, purchase, or purchase commitment after being awarded with contract.3. Suppliers must employ substantial manpower, including at least 30 entry staff, 1 programmer and 2 administrators with proof of health and labor insurance or the affidavit by the suppliers.Others1.Bidder statement for government procurement is requirement for making a tender.2. Suppliers should prepare letter of authorization and identification of authorized person and arrive the tender opening location at the designated time.3. Suppliers should supply 1 bidding documentation, 16 service proposals and 2 compact discs. The briefing is presented according to the order of bidding. Please bring notebooks to the tender opening location and test them in advance.4. Suppliers should submit the Check Bid Bond Consent.5. Please refer to the Tender Notice, Request for Proposal and Contract for more details.6.Electronic receipt of tender documentation through internet; the website: http://web.pcc.gov.tw7.In accordance to environmental protection policy, please prepare the green cups.

決標資料.履約執行機關: 機關代碼：3.7.53機關名稱：財政部臺灣省北區國稅局
